name: clever-wing
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Increases the target’s Special Defense effort by 1.

flavor_text.black-white: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the base Sp. Def stat of a single Pokémon.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: An item for use on a Pokémon. It slightly increases the base Sp. Def stat of a single Pokémon.
